meta.title: AKC Solutions Corp - Air Conditioning Specialists Miami
meta.description: Professional air conditioning services in Miami. Installation, repair and maintenance with 10 years of experience. Available 24/7.

hero.heroTitle: Air Conditioning Specialists that Care for your Home and Power your Business
hero.subtitle: Professional HVAC services in Miami with full warranty
hero.description: Over 10 years of experience providing reliable and efficient air conditioning solutions
hero.productsTitle: Freshness and Comfort Guaranteed for your Family and Business

brand.title: 10 Years of HVAC Experience
brand.description: AKC Solutions brings over a decade of experience from Nicaragua to the North American market. We specialize in providing quality, reliable and energy-efficient air conditioning solutions for Miami and surrounding areas.

faq.title: Answers to your HVAC Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our services

items.question: Do you cover the entire Miami area?
items.answer: Yes, we provide service in Miami, Homestead, Florida City, Coral Gables, Hialeah and Opa-locka with installation, maintenance and repair of air conditioners.

items.question: How long does installation take?
items.answer: Residential air conditioning installation takes 2-4 hours. For commercial and industrial projects, we coordinate according to specific needs.

items.question: Do you have technical service available?
items.answer: We have specialized technicians available 24/7 with parts for all brands we handle.

items.question: Do you offer energy consulting?
items.answer: Yes, we help optimize air conditioning usage to improve comfort and reduce energy consumption.

contact.whatsappMessage: Hello, I'm interested in getting more information about your air conditioning services.
